query:
SELECT
            t.id,
            t.route_id,
            t.direction,
            t.assigned,
            t.created_at,
            array_agg(jsonb_build_object('stop_id',
            st.stop_id,
            'arrival',
            st.arrival,
            'departure',
            st.departure)
        ORDER BY
            st.arrival) AS stop_times
        FROM
            trips t
        LEFT JOIN stop_times st ON
            t.id = st.trip_id
        WHERE
            t.id = ANY(
            SELECT
                t.id
            FROM
                trips t
            LEFT JOIN stop_times st ON
                st.trip_id = t.id
            WHERE
                st.stop_id = ANY($1)
                    AND st.arrival > now())
        GROUP BY
            t.id
